event AllyRewardDistributed(address indexed ally, address indexed trader, uint256 volumeUsd, uint256 amountToken, uint256 amountValueUsd)
event AllyRewardsClaimed(address indexed ally, uint256 amountToken)
event ReferrerRegistered(address indexed trader, address indexed referrer)
event ReferrerRewardDistributed(address indexed referrer, address indexed trader, uint256 volumeUsd, uint256 amountToken, uint256 amountValueUsd)
event ReferrerRewardsClaimed(address indexed referrer, uint256 amountToken)
event ReferrerWhitelisted(address indexed referrer, address indexed ally)
function distributeReferralReward(address trader, uint256 volumeUsd, uint256 pairOpenFeeP, uint256 tokenPriceUsd) returns (uint256)
function getTraderReferrer(address trader) view returns (address referrer)
